english: So Allah, seized him with punishment for his last [i.e. his saying: "I am your lord, most high") (see Verse 79:24)] and first [(i.e. his saying, "O chiefs! I know not that you have a god other than I" (see Verse 28:38)] transgression.
bengali: অতঃপর আল্লাহ তাকে পরকালের ও ইহকালের শাস্তি দিলেন।
